sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import { User, Lock, Settings, LogOut, ChevronRight, ArrowLeft } from 'lucide-react'; const Profile = ({ user, theme, onLogout }) => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const isDark = theme === 'dark'; const styles = { // 1. Main Container (Responsive & Centered) container: { backgroundColor: isDark ? '#0f172a' : '#f8fafc', // Light grey background minHeight: '100vh', fontFamily: "'Inter', sans-serif", display: 'flex', flexDirection: 'column', alignItems: 'center', padding: '20px', paddingBottom: '40px' }, contentWrapper: { width: '100%', maxWidth: '430px', // Keeps it looking like the mobile screenshot on desktop display: 'flex', flexDirection: 'column', gap: '16px' }, // 2. Header header: { display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', width: '100%', marginBottom: '10px', position: 'relative' }, backBtn: { cursor: 'pointer', color: isDark ? '#fff' : '#1e293b', padding: '8px', borderRadius: '50%', position: 'absolute', left: 0 }, headerTitle: { flex: 1, textAlign: 'center', fontSize: '18px', fontWeight: '700', color: isDark ? '#fff' : '#1e293b' }, // 3. Main Profile Card (Avatar + Name) mainCard: { backgroundColor: isDark ? '#1e293b' : '#fff', borderRadius: '24px', padding: '30px 20px', display: 'flex', flexDirection: 'column', alignItems: 'center', boxShadow: '0 4px 20px rgba(0,0,0,0.02)', marginBottom: '10px' }, avatarContainer: { width: '100px', height: '100px', borderRadius: '50%', padding: '3px', background: 'linear-gradient(135deg, #5c5cfc 0%, #a78bfa 100%)', // The Purple/Blue Gradient Border marginBottom: '15px' }, avatar: { width: '100%', height: '100%', borderRadius: '50%', objectFit: 'cover', border: '4px solid #fff', // White gap between image and border display: 'block' }, name: { fontSize: '22px', fontWeight: '800', color: isDark ? '#fff' : '#1e293b', marginBottom: '4px' }, email: { fontSize: '14px', color: '#64748b', marginBottom: '16px' }, badge: { backgroundColor: '#5c5cfc', // Purple Badge color: '#fff', padding: '6px 24px', borderRadius: '20px', fontSize: '13px', fontWeight: '600' }, // 4. Info Card (College Details) infoCard: { backgroundColor: isDark ? '#1e293b' : '#fff', borderRadius: '20px', padding: '20px', display: 'flex', flexDirection: 'column', gap: '12px', boxShadow: '0 2px 10px rgba(0,0,0,0.01)' }, infoRow: { display: 'flex', justifyContent: 'space-between', alignItems: 'center', fontSize: '13px' }, infoLabel: { color: '#94a3b8', fontWeight: '500' }, infoValue: { color: isDark ? '#fff' : '#1e293b', fontWeight: '700' }, // 5. Menu Buttons (The List) menuBtn: { backgroundColor: isDark ? '#1e293b' : '#fff', borderRadius: '20px', padding: '16px 20px', display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', justifyContent: 'space-between', cursor: 'pointer', border: 'none', width: '100%', boxShadow: '0 2px 5px rgba(0,0,0,0.01)', transition: 'transform 0.1s' }, menuLeft: { display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', gap: '15px' }, iconBox: (bg, color) => ({ width: '38px', height: '38px', borderRadius: '12px', backgroundColor: bg, color: color, display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', justifyContent: 'center' }), menuText: (isRed) => ({ fontSize: '15px', fontWeight: '600', color: isRed ? '#ef4444' : (isDark ? '#fff' : '#1e293b') }) }; return (
{/* Header */}
navigate(-1)}>
Profile
{/* 1. Profile Picture Card */}
{/* THIS CONNECTS TO EDIT PROFILE */}

{user.name}

{user.email}

Student
{/* 2. College Info Card */}
College Name {user.college}
Register Number {user.regNo}
{/* 3. Edit Profile Button */} {/* 4. Change Password Button */} {/* 5. Settings Button */} {/* 6. Logout Button */}
); }; export default Profile;
